title: Along time i never got hextech chest
body: Along time my account never got Hextech Chest... why like this ??? or my account is old ?? plz fix it for me .. Thanks

replies.body: There aren't any issues currently with obtaining mastery chests.  Make sure to go over the [hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide to review requirements for chests.  If you're able to provide specific dates, champions, and any other information we may be able to locate your match through a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  We'll be happy to offer context if we're able to locate it with the details provided!

You can only get it if you score S in your game and next time you can get it again after 7 days or you could buy the hextech chest that's what i know hope this helps hope i didn't misunderstood you or something
